website_summaries.verdict: Editor's Note: Product not yet tested.

customer_reviews.title: Finally SNK Playmore Delivers !
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of KOF games, but let's face it most are WAY below par. The best KOF game imo is the PC Mugen version, but this is also very entertaining. The fight system is sophisticated , yet complex and unlike say Marvel vs Capcom you won't be able to pull combos off with ease. Many fan favourites have returned , such as Mature and there's lots to unlock, but the game probably borders on too easy. If you're a KOF fan, you're definately in for a treat. The graphics are sumptious, but the characters are probably a little too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Now works on Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Great now works on Xbox -one looks & plays sharper on Xbox one than it ever did on the PS3 you get a true 1080p frame rate
customer_reviews.author: MX-Phillipa Tillett

customer_reviews.title: great little arcade style hit
customer_reviews.text: pleasent graphics, it's colorful, the art is attractive, the characters are well designed and the sounds and music are awesome. I would have given this game a 5 if it had not been for the difficult controls due to the 360 controller and empty multiplayer. If you can afford a joystick for this game and like king of fighters, then this is for you
customer_reviews.author: Marloux

customer_reviews.title: not worth to play online
customer_reviews.text: The game is very good I enjoy it for a while but not enjoyable without friends around you. And the worse thing about this game is online multiplayer it has a very bad lag because I believe they don't have a dedicated server for this game it's a hosting service. it's almost impossible to play online unless the other person is in the same country.
customer_reviews.author: Kenshin

customer_reviews.title: Intense!
customer_reviews.text: A great game: the gameplay is nervous, you got a large pannel of playable characters the music is nice and the graphics are absolutely beautiful. In the great war of Capcom vs SNK, I think that KoF13 makes SSF4 bite the dust.
customer_reviews.author: BIALECKI Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun game
customer_reviews.text: Great and fun game. Still not better than KOF98 and KOF02 , but one of the best game that has left Playmore.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: 5 - Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best fighting games ever. I'm so happy with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: DeEdA

customer_reviews.title: Crap game
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this game and it's aged extremely is badly. I would much rather prefer to play Street fighter than this. It's a crying shame that this franchise is now dead.
customer_reviews.author: Shinobi Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant game!
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing KOF since 1994 and can say that KOF XIII is one of the best of the series. SNK did a great job here, well done! If you can't get enough on the console you can now find KOF to download on the Android market, which is just as good :) I highly recommend this game to anyone that likes fighting games.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The King of Fighters has returned
customer_reviews.text: Forget last year's fiasco (KoFXII). This is what Kof was, is and (hope) will be, the REAL King of Fighters. Nice artwork, good character selection, well balanced, and the online mode, although it gave some initial problems, is the key to the best fighting experience. We hope to be seeing more of this in the coming years.
customer_reviews.author: Moira

customer_reviews.title: Very technical
customer_reviews.text: If your a novice at fighting games this really isnt for you. The trials in this game are bloody hard! and the timing in executing the moves is also bloody hard
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: More technical than SF4 and Marvel, but very rewarding and fun
customer_reviews.text: This game is excellent, with all characters being fun, unique, and viable to play. Although the online isn't perfect, they have mentioned a patch is coming :D So if you want a indepth fighter, that's the pinicle of the KOF series, or just want something slightly different from street fighter, KOF XIII is a must have. Not convinced? CHECK OUT THIS SICK TRAILER: /watch?v=kKZk8ULvlAQ
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best KOF of this last decade !
customer_reviews.text: If you love KOF or fighting games, you must try this KOF ! Much more easy to play than a Street Fighter even if you have more defensive and offensive options.
customer_reviews.author: j.

customer_reviews.title: love u kof Xiii
customer_reviews.text: The best kof yet! If you like 2D fighter dont miss this one A true KOF! Thank you very much for the GREAT game! R.I.P Street fighter...
customer_reviews.author: mrHashcon

product_meta.title: King of Fighters XIII (Xbox 360)
product_meta.description:
Platform:Xbox 360Bringing together warriors from SNK fighting games like Fatal Fury and Art of Fighting, as well as heroes from other classic games like Psycho Soldier and Ikari Warriors, and adding an exciting story, The King of Fighters series is a dream festival of 2D fighting.

The King Of Fighters 13 features fighters from the entire history of the series and concludes the Ash Saga storyline.

Global online play - challenge anyone anywhere around the world

Featuring over 30 playable characters from the history of SNK's bestselling games, including: the return of fan favourites Mai Shiranui and Yuri Sakazaki

Five new characters never before seen in previous King Of Fighters games

Multiple special endings depending on specific characters or forming a specific team

Unlockable customisation options to make your fighter unique choose from over 20 colour types, parts and icons

Overhaul of the fighting mechanics, built completely new from the ground up

New NEO MAX super moves

Faster gameplay

Better environmental lighting and camera control

Ten game modes for the full KOF experience

Choose from: Arcade, Story, Versus, Mission, Online and more



BOX CONTAINS
Xbox 360 game
feature_bullets: Global online play – challenge anyone anywhere around the world
Featuring over 30 playable characters from the history of SNK’s bestselling games
Five new characters never before seen in previous KOF games
Multiple special endings depending on specific characters or forming a specific team
Unlockable customisation options to make your fighter unique
Choose from over 20 colour types, parts and icons
Overhaul of the fighting mechanics, built completely new from the ground up
Better environmental lighting and camera control
Ten game modes for the full KOF experience
Choose from: Arcade, Story, Versus, Mission, Online and more
